name: Sword Assailant
description:
A Rogue-like game where your goal - as a sword, is to eliminate all life.

Dash, slash and dodge enemies to try and beat your high score of levels conquered.

DOWNLOADABLE VERSION RECCOMENDED FOR BETTER PERFORMANCE!

Don't be surprised if there is lots of bugs, as this was made in a few days for Mini Jam 98: Empty!

Game Jam Limitation: Make it a Rogue-like

ALL ASSETS, SOUNDS AND MUSIC MADE BY ME

CONTROLS:

  • WASD or arrows to move
  • Aim with mouse
  • Left click to attack/slash
  • Space to dash

SOCIAL LINKS:
